title: BAE Systems developing multi-sensor satellite cluster for military intelligence
summary: BAE Systems said Sept. 7 it is developing its first multi-sensor satellite cluster to gather intelligence for military and disaster response needs in 2024.

title: Albedo announces $48 million Series A funding round
summary: Earth observation startup Albedo raised $48 million in a Series A funding round.

title: KMI wins three Space Force study contracts for debris cleanup technology
summary: Kall Morris Inc. announced Sept. 7 it received three study contracts for debris-remediation technologies under the Space Force’s Orbital Prime program.

title: OneWeb takes $229 million charge for canceled Soyuz launches
summary: OneWeb took a $229 million charge this year linked to the termination of its Soyuz launch contract and dozens of satellites stranded in Kazakhstan after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

title: Rocket Lab signs on to U.S. military’s ‘rocket cargo’ program
summary: Rocket Lab has signed a cooperative agreement with the U.S. military to explore the possibility of using its space launch vehicles to transport cargo around the world.
